column4: hello, my ndiswrapper driver for a wg111v3 usb wireless card is giving the error "IOCSIFMTU: Invalid argument" when i run dhcpclient... any ideas?
my usb driver isn't supported with madwifi
OK, do you sure you need dhcp
as far as i can tell
do you use rp-pppoe or pppoeconf
hmmm,  I don't have router only a wireless card
well does your dhcp work with the same drivers?
I don't use dhcp only pppoe
i see, thanks for the help anyway
